text:
Ain't that right? Who would have thought that Jack Bros would get a RIP from... Jack Bros!

And I'd never think in a million years that Atlus had a  game for the Virtual Boy... Honestly, I'd be surprised if any company had a VB game that wasn't VB Wario.

text: Glad to see you upload another song from this game within 1000 uploads. I loved the temple of nightmare song and would listen to it for hours. I promised myself I wouldn't expose myself to any other songs from the game unless you uploaded them. Unless of course, you uploaded 1000 more songs first. I'm happy now.

text: I do hope you give the Virtual Boy some more love in your future uploads. I love seeing tracks from the system's games in my sub box; the VB doesn't quite get the attention it deserves, especially when it comes to music.
